abilities.name: Interferance
abilities.description: An enemy about to make an attack gains +1 difficulty to that attack.

abilities.name: Precognitive Targeting
abilities.description: An ally about to make an attack gains the benefit of lock on.

abilities.name: Adaptive Code Intrusion
abilities.description: During an enemies turn, select an ally. You may use one tech attack known by that ally as a reaction. It must target the enemy whose turn it currently is.

abilities.name: Concussive Feedback
abilities.description: At the beginning of an Ally's turn, each enemy adjacent to them must pass a Hull check or become stunned until the end of their next turn.

abilities.name: Reverse Temporal Repair
abilities.description: An ally who's turn it is may use Stabilize as a free action

abilities.name: Causality Recursion
abilities.description: When an ally is hit by an attack that would cause them to take structure or stress damage, or an attack that would destroy their mech, you may intervene as a reaction. The attack misses, and if it would normally deal damage on a miss it deals zero damage.

abilities.name: Enlightenment
abilities.description: Zen reaches deep into his para-causal nature and breaks from his constraints as a physical consciousness completely, becoming a feral NHP and is unable to be controlled by a player from now on. Before doing so, he may trigger ONE enormous para-causal event.
